name: ocr-capture-service
description: Express.js + Puppeteer service for capturing pages and sending to OCR

scripts.dev: nodemon server.js --watch server.js --watch . --ext js,json --ignore uploads/ --ignore node_modules/
scripts.dev:debug: nodemon --inspect server.js --watch server.js --watch . --ext js,json --ignore uploads/ --ignore node_modules/
scripts.dev:verbose: nodemon server.js --watch server.js --watch . --ext js,json --ignore uploads/ --ignore node_modules/ --verbose

author: Wally Team
